name: The Holy Trinity
description:
Holy Trinity - Game Of The Year Edition  (funky mode included)

The year is 20XX, Mah boi Elon Musk has taken over the space with his roomba army. 
You are the ultimate weapon sent by the ugandan scientists to stop him.
Stop elon before he turns everyone into a roomba.

1 question remains:
is Elon the real culprit, or are there greater forces at play?

Intentionally bad game btw
by: Jonas & Elias
